options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a subtask

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many subtasks

properties.name: taskId
properties.description: The task to operate on

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the subtask to create

options.name: assignee
options.description: Set Assignee on the subtask. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: assignee_status
options.description: Set Assignee status on the subtask (requires Assignee)

options.name: completed
options.description: Whether the subtask should be marked completed

options.name: due_on
options.description: Date on which the time is due

options.name: liked
options.description: Whether the task is liked by the authorized user

options.name: notes
options.description: The task notes

options.name: workspace
options.description: The workspace to create the subtask in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: taskId
properties.description: The task to operate on

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: opt_fields
options.description: Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: opt_pretty
options.description: Whether to provide “pretty” output

options.name: assignee
options.description: The assignee to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify assignee, you must also specify the workspace to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: opt_fields
options.description: Defines fields to return. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: opt_pretty
options.description: Whether to provide “pretty” output

options.name: project
options.description: The project to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: section
options.description: The section to filter tasks on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: workspace
options.description: The workspace to filter tasks on. Note: If you specify workspace, you must also specify the assignee to filter on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: completed_since
options.description: Only return tasks that are either incomplete or that have been completed since this time

options.name: modified_since
options.description: Only return tasks that have been modified since the given time

properties.description: The ID of the task to be moved

properties.name: projectId
properties.description: Project to show the sections of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the task to update the data of

properties.description: The workspace in which the task is searched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: text

options.name: Add
options.description: Add a comment to a task

options.name: Remove
options.description: Remove a comment from a task

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the task to add the comment to

properties.name: isTextHtml
properties.description: Whether body is HTML or simple text

properties.name: text
properties.description: The plain text of the comment to add

properties.name: text
properties.description: Comment as HTML string. Do not use together with plain text.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Properties of the task comment

options.name: is_pinned
options.description: Whether to pin the comment

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the comment to be removed

options.name: Add
options.description: Add a task to a project

options.name: Remove
options.description: Remove a task from a project

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the task to add the project to

properties.name: project
properties.description: The project where the task will be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Other properties to set

options.name: insert_after
options.description: A task in the project to insert the task after, or null to insert at the beginning of the list

options.name: insert_before
options.description: A task in the project to insert the task before, or null to insert at the end of the list

options.name: section
options.description: A section in the project to insert the task into. The task will be inserted at the bottom of the section.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the task to add the project to

properties.name: project
properties.description: The project where the task will be removed from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Remove

properties.description: The ID of the task to add the tag to

properties.name: tag
properties.description: The tag that should be added. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a user

options.description: Get many users

properties.name: userId
properties.description: An identifier for the user to get data of. Can be one of an email address,the globally unique identifier for the user, or the keyword me to indicate the current user making the request.

properties.name: workspace
properties.description: The workspace in which to get users. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
